feed.title: Meowbeard's Blog
feed.subtitle: A Personal blog sharing, sharing day-to-day thoughts, progress on Minecraft map projects, and creative explorations in photography and cooking.

entry.title: 9 Tips to Instantly Improve your Minecraft Builds | My First Blog Post!

link.title: 9 Tips to Instantly Improve your Minecraft Builds | My First Blog Post!

entry.summary:
Hello! Welcome to my blog! I made this blog as a personal outlet - an honest and ever-evolving record of my daily life. I didn’t create this blog with some grand expectations, I just wanted a neat space where I can share some of my thoughts, ideas and maybe a bit of everyday rambling.
Since Minecraft has always been one of my favourite games and is also something very special for me, I wanted ...
